column2: "Thank you for your time. Thanks to you, each of us now has some clue as to what our wishes could be."
"Don't know what you did, but it's almost like I can see my wish coming true already."
"Still... what we have is rather vague. And it could be difficult to manage these by ourselves. We'd be grateful if you'd help us out."
"I regret continuing to impose on you, but could you stay with us for just a little longer?"
